Html:
I need to extract the text written inside comments. Is there any specific method to do it?

I am able to get the comments using 
var comments = compiler.Context.Language.Grammar.NonGrammarTerminals;
The next step is to get the text inside the comments. Can anyone please help me regarding this?

Thanks,
Sreeja.
The result of parsing is ParseTree consisting of ParseTreeNode objects. Each node has Comments property - list of all comments preceding this node.
